reviews.review: Best competetive FPS around atm - frequently updated, lots of resources online to help you find your way around the game, fun casual game modes.
Super gra! Warto poświęcić swój  czas na nią =)
MODERN COMPETITIVE GAMING has turned experiences like this into hyperactive narcissistic slot-machine runways for insane losers. But it is Counter-Strike. So, there's that, I guess.
